Posts.Content: Hi Kacang So sorry you got so poorly off the dex my hubby is on 4mg daily he is terminal prostate cancer and if he did not have them he would have no life at all just sleep all day and would not be able to walk, we have been told about the steroids causing diabetes and he has his  bloods checked weekly, there are so many ups and downs with dex he had to detox a few months ago as the dex and the morphine made him so toxic he was so ill coming down off these drugs i hope you get on better this time he is very wary all the time as well think its just having cancer makes people like this good luck with them cathy xx
